comment.description:
The mapping used in the module is more generic as the definition of product_definition_usage in part 44 is explicit about the usage of something in a given context. The intent of Breakdown_element_realization is to represent the realization of something, it is nothing necessarily to do with usage in any context.
Here is the definition of product_definition_usage
The product_definition_usage is a product_definition_relationship that specifies a directed association between two product_definitions in which the related_product_definition is used in the context of the relating_product_definition. The product_definition_usage establishes a relationship stating that the related product is used in the context of the relating product. This usage is established for the life cycle stages and application contexts in which the two products are described.

comment.description:
We agree that the description / model of breakdown_of should be clarified. We don't entirely agree with your proposals - we are definitely not talking about breakdown_of configuration_watched items or product_concepts - that may be a requirement,
To clarify our model we will look into:
delete the entity breakdown_definition, Breakdown/Breakdown_version identify the breakdown. Breakdown_definition implies that there can be multiple views of a breakdown which is not the case.
Relate breakdown_element_usage.breakdown_context to breakdown_version
Use breakdown_of to relate a breakdown_version to a product_view_definition
A breakdown identifies a breakdown.
The different views of a product may have different breakdowns. E.g. the mechanical_view and the electrical_view may have functional breakdowns. Hence the breakdown_of relates a breakdown_version (identifying the version of the mechanical functional_breakdown) to the product_view_definition representing the mechanical_view and another breakdown_version (identifying the version of the electrical functional_breakdown) relates the product_view_definition representing the electrical_view
